6.0.1.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
6.0.1.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- [AutoTile] Add Has Physics Shape property if Collider Type is set to Sprite. AutoTile will set Collider Type to Sprite if the Sprite has physics shape and set Collider Type to None if the Sprite has no physics shape.

### Fixed
- [RuleTileEditor] Fix exception thrown when a Rule is added to an empty RuleTile, removed and added again.
- [AutoTileEditor] Fix minimum texture scale size when texture is smaller than 256 pixels
- [AutoTileEditor] Fix texture display when texture is removed from AutoTile

5.0.0.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
5.0.0.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- [AutoTile] Add Random property. AutoTile randomly picks a Sprite if multiple Sprites share the same mask. Otherwise, uses the first Sprite set with the mask.

### Changed
- Update minimum Unity version.

### Fixed

- [AutoTileEditor] Only clear entries for current Texture when loading an AutoTileTemplate for the selected Texture
- [AutoTileEditor] Improve duplication checks for entries across multiple Textures

4.3.0.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
4.3.0.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed

- [AutoTile] Add AutoTile to Table of Contents
- [AutoTile] Add warning when loading an asset which is not an AutoTileTemplate when loading an AutoTileTemplate
- [AutoTileEditor] Set better limits for Texture Scale depending on size of original Texture
- [AutoTileEditor] Save set Texture Scale
- [RuleTileEditor] Set expansion limits for TilingRule to a maximum of 10
- [RuleTileEditor] Set default properties to TilingRule when adding a new TilingRule
- [Editor] Set an upper limit of 1000 for editable collection sizes

3.1.0.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
3.1.0.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- [AnimatedTileEditor] -Add field to change TileAnimationFlags (For 2022.2.x)
- [RuleTile] -Add RotatedMirror rule which checks neighbors using both the mirror and rotation Rule in addition to the standard rotation Rule

### Fixed
- [GameObjectBrush] Fix placement of GameObjects for Hexagon Layouts with Anchor
- [GameObjectBrush] Align rotation and flip to 2D View in Editor
- [RandomBrush] Use default color and transform when painting over with RandomBrush

### Changed
- [AnimatedTileEditor] Moved to Unity.2d.Tilemap.Extras.Editor

2.2.1.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
2.2.1.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.
